website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive and charming, kids will enjoy building the entire mini-playground and sending its trio of rodents flying via the hamster launcher when it’s assembled.
pros: Construct a large exercise wheel and hamster playground accessories

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: The current top reviewers built the hamster wheel wrong. Stop encouraging them upvotes. Make sure you are attaching the pink 2x2 curved slope at the right height. If the hamster bike is too stiff, pull the white 3x2 coupling plate with hole away from the wheel a smidge to loosen it. Even if you can't get the hamster wheel to work, this is an under $10 set that comes with 3 hamsters, a nice minidoll, and a bunch of uncommon pieces and colors.
customer_reviews.author: B. Berelson

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute set but very small. The wheel works and the pets are cute. It was played with several times after built.
customer_reviews.author: momok

customer_reviews.title: Very easily assembled
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if my kid is just really fast or these are too easy but it took her less than 15 minutes to assemble this set. She said it was too easy but she does love it.
customer_reviews.author: JustEmme

customer_reviews.title: not for 5 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the ingenuity and creativity needed to design this toy. I bought it for my 5-yo g-daughter and had to build it for her. I love legos. so, building it was a pleasure. However, in the future, Ill stick to bigger block until she gets older. I love the idea and the concept of the ferris wheel. However, I would like to see it larger for younger children with fewer parts. Nonetheless. I will buy more kits and more blocks for her in the future as she continues to grow and develop better fine motor skills. Thank you for putting this kit on the market.
customer_reviews.author: oribhabor

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 hampster in our set?
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Xmas because she loves hampsters and hers recently passed away and the grey one in the pic looked just like hers. She was so excited when she opened and then so disappointed when she opened the box due to the fact we only received one hampster and it was not the grey one. I felt so bad. I read the reviews and the pic shows 3 and everyone else got 3, why didn't we? The set was not too expensive and she loves Lego's but wish it had everything in it.
customer_reviews.author: Melony K.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR ANIMAL LOVERS
customer_reviews.text: My girls really enjoy the LEGO friends sets that include little animals. I know they will both get a kick out of these cute little Hamsters. Just for reference my girls are 4 and 9. My 4 year old is a bit young to assemble it on her own, but it’s easy for my older daughter to build independently. I’m sure they’ll enjoy opening this on Christmas Day.
customer_reviews.author: CalledMama

customer_reviews.title: Another cute Lego set
customer_reviews.text: This is another cute Lego set, that will make a nice gift. I was happy to give it, and it made a nice presentation. I think you can't go wrong with Lego. They have sets for all interests, and I think it's a good gift to give. This is a smaller set, and was a nice add on to a medium sized set that I bought for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Good value but...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is six and although she really wanted this... I think it was a little hard for her to do on her own. Lost interest in it pretty quickly because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Rogga

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My four year old has been asking for Lego sets. I thought they might be a little difficult for her yet so I thought we'd start small. She put this together with some assistance from an adult to go through the steps in order. She enjoyed putting it together and playing with it afterward. Came as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E

customer_reviews.title: Came box destroyed
customer_reviews.text: First of all I was surprised on how small this Lego set was however it is really cute but my main complaint is the box came completely destroyed. I find this very upsetting. This purchase was a gift and I cannot gift a torn up box. I’m upset and also sad that Amazon would send this out!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute for kids ages 7 and up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5yr old but she couldn’t put it together by herself so she lost interest. Her 7yr old sister did (with my help). It’s a cute set with the LEGO quality. I wouldn’t pay more than the seven bucks I paid for it tho.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: fun but not creative parts
customer_reviews.text: I usually just buy the classic and creator series. I decided to buy this one to just try friends. It looks very attractive for little girls anyway. My daughter enjoyed putting pieces together. I noticed a lot of special and fun pieces. The only down side is this set is not general for kid to explores. not much room to create or play with.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves the LEGO Friends sets and I’m always looking for a good deal on them. She assembles them mostly as directed but then makes her own creations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter LEGO set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 5 yo granddaughter. She enjoys imaginative play, and had no problem building the hamster set. My only suggestion, would be to include a bag or box to store the small pieces. The main downside of Legos, are the numerous small parts.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Pardoe

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun LEGO treat to enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet little LEGO set that is sure to be a welcome treat. My 9 year old granddaughter loved it and enjoyed it being easy for her to assemble and enjoy. She had so much fun building and playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: My Little One LOVED this!
customer_reviews.text: My girl is 5 and absolutely loves LEGO sets! I wanted to get her something smaller that she could assemble herself, and this was perfect. I am so pleased and these little sets are the best for little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This is a win with my 7 yo daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My 7-yr-old loves Legos...and cute hamsters. She wanted a set that didn’t cost too much and when she saw this she was so excited. She put it together on her own (huge win for me) and quickly, but she’s had several hours of play in combination with her other Legos.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMama

customer_reviews.title: fun for younger ones also
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is 6 loved putting this together. It was easy enough for her to do by herself. As with all legos they seem to cost more then they should but she used her own money to buy it
customer_reviews.author: kister

customer_reviews.title: Love it! A little more challenging than the 4+ set.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old just got interested in Legos. She does really well with the 4+ sets, but this one is a 6+. I had to help her more and it's a little more complicated than the 4+ sets. We love the hamsters and all the fun little things we built in this set. My daughter loves playing with it so it was worth it. She loves doing things on her own so we'll be sticking with the 4+ sets a little longer. It's a great little toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amber L

customer_reviews.title: Warped Box
customer_reviews.text: The box came warped and the flap opened. The product inside was fine but the presentation was terrible. The shipping box was fine, the other products in the box were fine. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Thomas

customer_reviews.title: daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter who just turned 5. she loved it. she put it together with a little help from me and has been playing with it all afternoon. wheel turns and the hamsters are adorable,
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my child's friend and was able to get another for her as well. She will be pleasantly surprised for Xmas! She has been wanting Lego's but the larger sets can be quite pricey. She wanted this particular set too!
customer_reviews.author: Talisha

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Christmas wasn't complete until my daughter opened this gem. Her eyes lit up almost as bright as the tree lol. But she was so excited to put it together and it was super easy and now its a lovely addition to the rest of her collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Sparks Joy
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t like hamsters? My daughter thought it was adorable and played with the completed set for hours. The hilarious shenanigans overheard had me rollin.

customer_reviews.title: As always, Lego does not Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This is the quality you would expect from Lego. My 8 year old daughter easily followed the instructions on her own. This had pretend play appeal beyond the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: happybuyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little lego kit that comes with several of the cute hamsters. It was easy to build, and had several interactive elements. For the small kit price range, this has been one of the better sets.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Cute... typical terribly over-priced LEGO... but cute hamsters save the day
customer_reviews.text: Cute gift. Not too expensive... but still a ridiculously over-priced Lego. The little hamsters 🐹 in the set are an adorable addition
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E Neaves

customer_reviews.title: daughter completed another set

customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun Set!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves this set. The hamster wheel spins which is so much fun, she loved building it and LOVES to play with it!!

product_meta.title: LEGO Friends Olivia’s Hamster Playground 41383 Building Kit (81 Pieces)
product_meta.description: LEGO Friends 41383 Olivia’s Hamster Playground is a small and easy-to-build LEGO animal set featuring a clever hamster wheel with a gear function to spin it round. The tiny hamster motorcycle fits into the front so it looks like Harry is riding his motorbike round the wheel! It is built on a circular base that can be fitted onto the stage of LEGO Friends 41368 Andrea’s talent Show. Remove the motorbike from the wheel and drive these LEGO animals it around the playground, which also comprises a ramp, slalom and a hoop. Includes a LEGO Friends Olivia mini-doll figure, plus 3 hamster figures.
feature_bullets: Build a clever spinning hamster wheel and wow the LEGO Friends Heartlake crowds with your amazing performing pets!
This set includes an Olivia mini-doll figure, 3 hamster figures, a hamster wheel with spinning function, mini car, mini motorcycle, slalom, ramp and a hoop.
81 pieces – For boys and girls aged 6+ ] and for fans and kids of all ages
Wheel measures over 2” (7cm) high, 2” (6cm) wide and 2” (6cm) deep
The LEGO Friends Olivia’s Hamster Playground 41383 building toy can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,977 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
